traits.name: Brave
entries: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
